website_summaries.verdict: Attain real blood pressure results with long-term use.
pros: Great for those who monitor their blood pressure and are in tune with their body's stats
Customers report their vitamin D levels rise with use of this supplement as well

customer_reviews.title: k2 and d3..take calcium too though!!
customer_reviews.text: As a 20 year naturopath, I know how critical it is to take k2 and d3 together. Be sure to order some type of calcium product to take with this supplement. It is also essential for all 3 to work in concert to get perfect ongoing results. The k2's purpose is to make sure that calcium gets delivered properly into the bones, etc. Without calcium in the equation, it is easy to begin getting too much k2.
customer_reviews.author: Alternative Remedies

customer_reviews.title: Surprise: I felt even better
customer_reviews.text: I finished one bottle already and have ordered another. I had been taking 5000 IU Vit. D from a different brand and felt a lift in mood and general well-being. I expected to have similar results with this supplement, but have actually felt even better. I am very impressed with this supplement and highly recommend it to anyone suffering from depression, anxiety, and anyone over 50. If you haven't asked your doctor about Vit D supplements, do so asap.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combo of K2 and D
customer_reviews.text: My doctor regularly checks my Vitamin D levels. I used to buy a top of the line product that worked well, but was way too expense. I switched to a cheaper product and my levels rapidly dropped. Then I came across Zhou Nutrition. It was priced right so I gave it a shot. My Vitamin D levels quickly went back up to the right level. I also like the amount of K2 I'm getting, which is higher than my previous combination was. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Monika, Ft. Worth, TX

customer_reviews.title: Take D? Then take Calcium. Take Calcium? Then take K.  This combo is D and K. Now go get some Calcium too.
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to take D you should take Calcium. And if you're going to take Calcium you should take K. Now I take this "combo" and a Calcium supplement. Add some fish oil and perhaps a multi-vitamin and maybe a probiotic. I think sufficient D and daily fish oil are probably the most important things to supplement, based on research I've done over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he feels much better, he told me he can feel the difference ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these supplements for my husband who is currently having joint pain in his hands and back. Since he's been taking these supplement, he feels much better, he told me he can feel the difference in his hands, he can open and close his hands much better and the pain in his back and shoulders seem to feel much better. He really swears by these supplements. Soon I will be trying them as well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'll definitely be ordering this supplement again! The cost for the high quality can't be beat. I leave at a high elevation and have have low Vitamin D levels. I'll be getting the testing done again soon to see how it's changed since taking Zhou K2 & D3. Bonus: My hair and nails are growing so much faster! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Daly

customer_reviews.title: Know The Difference between IU and MGs
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it is my bad for not knowing. We have been ordering this for a long while now and I was under the impression that I was getting 5000 mg of D plus K. Nope. Actually only getting Vit K. My better half had her full yearly Dr. check-up recently and was told she was deficient in Vit D ! How could that be! I wrote to Zhou. It is 5000 IU of Vit. D - which, I looked up, translates into not even 2 milligrams. No wonder she is deficient. As long as you know what you are getting, go for it. It is really only a bottle of Vit. K.
customer_reviews.author: Callmered53

customer_reviews.title: There's a first time for everything !
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm wondering how many empty capsules I will find. First time I poured out in my hand and WHAT.... ? That's never happened to me with any other vitamin. Wont worry unless it happens again. Will update in how well they actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My bones and joints don't crack and pop as badly or often.
customer_reviews.text: I chose to try this as I know those ingredients aren't ones I usually acquire through my eating habits or drinking and was curious. So far, my hands no longer ache when I turn them in full circles nor do I feel or hear any cracking and popping when I clench my hands into a fist. My wrist likewise aren't aching from moving at solid angles. My knees don't pop nearly as often even when I'm stuck in a crouching position for awhile due to work. Heck, I've not had a pop in over a week now. As of now, all signs are good and showing improvement thanks to this one. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine product (which I can't take)
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this product (the MK7 form of vitamin K2) can cause heart palpitations in susceptible people, so I cannot take this. Probably would be fine for those with stong hearts. Revised review: Zhou Nutrition just refunded my full purchase price for this product, without my even asking for a refund. What great customer service! Again: this product is perfectly fine, just not a good fit for my body (I get heart palpitations and should avoid certain supplements, which includes the MK7 form of K2). Thanks so much, Zhou Nutrition!
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty1

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT INCREASE VIT D LEVELS AT 2 PILLS PER DAY IN BLOOD TEST......
customer_reviews.text: I almost never leave reviews but this really pissed me off.. i have taken generic vit d at vitamin shoppe and had way better success then with this.. bunk product.

customer_reviews.title: too bad I can't get a refund
customer_reviews.text: It was too strong for me. I had to stop taking it, too bad I can't get a refund! Update: I decided to add to my review and minutes after I wrote this review, a representative of Zhou Nutrition contacted me and told me they would give me a full refund and if I find something else that I like my first bottle would be free. I really appreciated that because I had called Amazon and asked could I get a refund and they said I was out of the window for receiving a refund. Thank you Zhou Nutrition. Great customer service.

customer_reviews.text: I broke out in hives taking this. Constantly itchy, some capsules were even open.

customer_reviews.title: Little known beneficial supplement.
customer_reviews.text: The new research has shown that K2 is an important vitamen complex that is synergistic with vitamen D and calcium. I love that Zhou has both D and K2 in the same supplement. I could swear my teeth are whiter and my gums healthier but I'm taking more than one supplement so that might be a stretch. There are also supplements of K2 that contain more than just K7, but they are not in combination with D3. I wish this one did. When all is said and done it may not matter. I always keep this one in stock.
customer_reviews.author: M. Costas

customer_reviews.title: FITS THE BILL
customer_reviews.text: I have always taken Vitamin D because I believe it is essential for a healthy life, especially if you are out in the sun a lot. I am trying to mend a cavity right now, so I chose a high level D3 that included K2 as part of my mend/remineralization protocol. There are very few manufacturers that include both vitamins in one product, believe me, so this one fits the bill. I have had no adverse reaction and love that it is non-GMO and very affordable. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: KJHall

customer_reviews.text: I just opened my last bottle ordered and found that although there was a plastic seal around the outside the cardboard and foil protective top have been punctured. Upon further inspection I counted that I only have 50 pills and one is just an empty half of a capsule shell. I do not recommend this product at all. I would give this zero stars if I could.

I was using cheap Vitamin D from a major chain and it was not working. This product works. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

I was advised to supplement so I researched a bit and decided to get this brand. Fast forward 1 month later, I re-tested my Vit D and it’s up to 34.4 and in range. I was amazed that it was able to raise my levels up in such a short time but I’m also quite happy about it. I’m sure in another month my levels will look even better. If you’re looking to improve your Vit D levels, then do get these. They really work well.

Calcium is such a large mineral that when a company tries to combine it with the D3 and K2 they skimp on them. So Zhou's with a quality calcium is a good match.

Started taking it again to make sure, and after about 2 hours the dizziness and nausea returned. I am returning this product and buying a lower dose, 2-3000 ius.

I saw this brand recommended on a Vit D FB page and tried it. Vit D3 5,000 with K2 for 2 months. My levels 2 months later are now 63. Very happy. Try it if you are in the same boat!

customer_reviews.title: Just what my doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended both the k2 and D 3 and when I found these together, I was thrilled! It was exactly what I needed. Have it on subscribe and save, too so don't habe to really think about reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Makes A Difference in My Mood.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have to take D3 daily all year, and adding the K2 has really made a difference in my life. When I was taking plain D3 I didn't feel anything, I took it because I had to. When I started taking these vitamins, I felt a difference in my mood - I don't think that it's the placebo effect because if it was then I would have felt better with the D3. So, thanks Zhou for making a great combo - now, if you could only pack it in Coconut Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Brkpnt

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin K helped with bruising!
customer_reviews.text: I have always bruised easily. So when needing to increase my Vitamin D intake I thought I’d try this supplement with Vitamin K which is supposed to help with bruising. Happy to say that it not only brought my Vitamin D levels (blood work) up, but I have really noticed that my bruising is significantly better!
customer_reviews.author: A&E Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Just got my first blood test back since starting this supplement and my D3 level is perfect. I've had chronic Vitamin D3 deficiency and have had to take prescription strength D3 to correct it in the past. I take 1 of these a day and it seems to have corrected my issues with D3.
customer_reviews.author: AP21

customer_reviews.title: Great absorbency, works well.
customer_reviews.text: These don't really have a flavor. I take it daily along with my calcium supplement, and it seems to help. Although I am usually deficient of D3, especially at this time of year, my last blood test showed I am no longer deficient, so it is working! I am on keto, so I am not sure how else I would know the K2 is working, but if the D3 is, I would guess the K is also!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Zhou Nutrition Vitamin K2 With Vitamin D3
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for quite some time now, to very good health effect for me. It's also very important to take a high quality magnesium supplement in conjunction with Vitamin D3. Also, please note, it's important that it be vitamin D3, not just D.
customer_reviews.author: G. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I assume it's working
customer_reviews.text: I have never noticed any changes from any supplement I have ever taken. I simply hope they are doing what they are supposed to do. Since I cannot say the supplement is working or that it isn't working, I clicked on the middle (for neither good nor bad) star which resulted in the 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Robin V

customer_reviews.title: after 2 months my energy level is still very good My brother was having the same problem after doing ...
customer_reviews.text: The doctor told me I was low on vit. Did some reading and yours was the only one that combined D3 and k2 before starting I had no energy etc. after 2 months my energy level is still very good My brother was having the same problem after doing the same as I did he had the same result thank you for combining the 2 vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Erik W. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow, has other nutritional ingredients in it too.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, has other nutritional ingredients in it too which allows for the Vitamin D to absorb better.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie T.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I liked the price. Unfortunately I got what I paid for. This is not the best D3+K. These are vitamins that require a fat source for best absorption. The zhou brand does not use an oil like most other brands, therefore, one must take more to get the best absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hajost

customer_reviews.title: Love this combination vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product and will buy it again and again! So glad Amazon has it on their Subscribe and Save program. What I like about it is that it is a high potency D3 with the added benefit of K2. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Jean Berry

customer_reviews.title: Natural Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have discontinued use of Boniva due to multiple foot fractures ( 3 in 9 yrs). I did my own research purchased the book "Osteoporosis- Lies my doctor told me". the research suggested Vitamins K2-D3 & A along with daily weight bearing exercise and taking plenty of calcium. Although it's too early to see results as that will come with my next bone density testing - I am hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Gal

customer_reviews.title: Found this combo of K and D and love it all in one supplement
customer_reviews.text: Found this combo of K and D and love it all in one supplement. My Blood Dr suggested I take both to improve my heart health as well as improve my sleep cycles. Since I began this 6 months ago my D3 levels are up and my sleep pattern is more regular.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I do notice a difference when I take these/ Originally ...
customer_reviews.text: I do notice a difference when I take these/ Originally purchased because my former job had me in a middle office area without windows/light. Was very depressing. No longer in that situation but feel adding these to my regimen has helped to counteract the affects of that experience.
customer_reviews.author: momindtown

customer_reviews.title: After learning of a pretty significant vitamin D deficiency
customer_reviews.text: After learning of a pretty significant vitamin D deficiency, I tasked myself to find the best vitamin to support a healthy diet. I did some research and found that ingesting the vitamin D alone in large quantities was quite harmful without Vitamin K2. I was happy to find this affordable tablet that is easy to swallow and doesn't leave any weird after tastes. I highly recommend this product to others with vitamin D deficiencies.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: The perfect D3 supplement
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I found this supplement! I have been searching for a combination of D3 & K2 that was good dosages along with a reasonable price, and I finally found it! I am going to explore other products from Zhou Nutrition as well. Now it's only one capsule and done, no more multi capsules to get everything needed in my D3/K2 supplement.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Get your Calcium to where your bones need it, not to areas you have arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I need over 5000 IU of vitamin D3, along with several other vitamins and minerals due to such severe osteoporosis. I also havr arthritis all over, which can be a problem taking calcium. Calcium will go to areas one doesn't want it to go. It can make arthritis so much worse. The vitamin K in this product help my body delivrt the calcium where I need it and not where I don't. That's so great.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for results.
customer_reviews.text: Pills are a little bigger than expected. Does not cause any issues, no idea if they work but I trust them after researching the company. Will continue to use till I see the doctor for blood tests and see if they make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: Best amount of K2 and D3 for us
customer_reviews.text: This combo of vitamins is recommended for persons with Parkinsons and also those with high cholesterol. Your product has the best balance of the vitamins and so is the most convenient.
customer_reviews.author: s smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product ... I’m chronically Vit D deficient ... Helped maintain Vit D level, increased my energy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice price-point for people newly interested in the combo of ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice price-point for people newly interested in the combo of these two supplements. Small capsules, no upset or odd reaction. Lots of statements of quality on label; can't be sure about those without more research but this got me back on the K2 "program", which is what I wanted. Fast delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: guess there is really no way to know if they are working like all vitamin no but I take them andhope for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've heard the benefits of these two together and that is why I take them. guess there is really no way to know if they are working like all vitamin no but I take them andhope for the best
customer_reviews.author: Red Riding Hood

customer_reviews.title: Mother and I both got chest pains.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these but after both my mother and I experienced chest pain after taking these for a week, we stopped. So did the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rumi

customer_reviews.title: Not small, about medium
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to swallow. It's not a huge capsule but it's not small. HOWEVER, it's very easy to open and it doesn't have a bad taste at all. I put it in my cereal each morning.
customer_reviews.author: enduser

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: ZI’ve been taking this product for several months with regular Vitamin D testing. My value is higher than it has been in the last seven years since being diagnosed with Vitamin D Deficiency. Previously on prescription D3 alone or other OTC products I was unable to reach the low end of normal. I am now holding with normal range. I highly recommend giving this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: This was highly recommended by a  orthopedic surgeon
customer_reviews.text: The protective seal was broken, I have no idea how safe this product is I have no ability to verify the safety of this product.
customer_reviews.author: M Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product -
customer_reviews.text: Blood test showed me to be lacking in Vitamin D. I also have "progressive disc disease" which causes a great deal of pain. Because of the vitamin K-2 the D-3 goes right to the bones. It was amazing - the first capsule made a remarkable difference. Wonderful product! One a day, that's all it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it worked...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it worked at all. I live in minnesota and it gets dreadfully dreary here in the winter months (Ikes right now). I use a happy lamp as well. Anyway, I went back to just regular vitamin d3. Also after getting my d3 levels checked I know I'm getting a good amount of d3.
customer_reviews.author: Thelilnapper

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent for Sinuses, but also...
customer_reviews.text: So, i bought this product with the hope it would help with sinus congestion, and it does that really well. I've been using this product in combination with my Resmed CPAP Airsense 10 for about 4 weeks and i love it. The added bonus is that although i clean the apparatus, tubes, etc. approx once weekly, it always has a slight odor (not foul) just before the air pressure kicks on, but now instead i smell the essential oil. So far between the two essential scents that come with this product, i prefer the "Clear" scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find this supplement with both the vit K and D3, as you get older we need all the help we can get and since I don't spend as much time outdoors I really need the Vit D3 with added benefit of Vit K. It's pretty affordable, more so if you subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: IG1323

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The pills were much larger than anticipated and the coating gets gooey quickly. This is why they were harder to swallow. After taking this entire bottle I don’t feel like I have gained anything from it. My vitamin D still tests low. Maybe it needs to be taken for months before there is a noted difference but with the problem I have with swallowing them and no change in my D levels I have to go back to what was working - plain old generic D.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: Vitamin K2 (MK7) with D3 Supplement - Vitamin D & K Complex - Bone and Heart Health Formula - 5000 IU Vitamin D3 & 90 mcg Vitamin K2 MK-7 - 60 Small & Easy to Swallow Vegetable Capsules
product_meta.description: K2D3 is your go-to vitamin D supplement to support your heart, bones, muscles, and mood. Vitamin D3 is THAT important, and it needs vitamin K2 to maximize all those benefits. With an estimated 1 billion people worldwide experiencing vitamin D deficiencies, supplementing is an effective solution—especially if you get less sun exposure during those winter months. Our premium formulation packs a punch with 5000 IU per serving and the most bioavailable form of K2 available (MK-7).
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT PAIR. Most people know the benefits of vitamin D, but many don’t realize that vitamin D NEEDS vitamin K2 to maximize benefits. If you’re fighting a vitamin D deficiency, you need to supplement Vitamin K2 as well. Zhou’s K2+D3 has you covered.

BONE SUPPORT. The ‘sunshine vitamin’ D3 helps your body absorb calcium while vitamin K2 (as MK-7, the form of K2 with the highest bioavailability) directs calcium to your bones instead of joints and arteries, where too much calcium could be problematic.

HEALTHY HEART FORMULA. Calcification occurs when calcium has been absorbed by the body, but deposited in arteries instead of bones. This premium formula helps support the proper absorption and distribution of calcium to help support a healthy heart.

ONLY THE BEST. Just one small, easy-to-swallow veggie capsule of K2+D3 per day provides 5000 IU of D3 and 90 mcg of K2 as MK-7, helping you support strong bones, a healthy cardiovascular system, and a strong immune system.

WHAT SETS US APART? At Zhou, we use only the highest-quality ingredients in an FDA certified facility following GMP (good manufacturing practices). Plus, we test everything at our lab in Utah, so you can be confident that you’re fueling your body with the very best.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
